Summary: Bell shaped, sillouetted by the sun, no sound, hovering.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around August 11th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsHaving a party in my back yard, which started around 4:30, a girlfriend spotted it and asked what it was. Witnessed by at least 25 people, silloetted by the sun, hovering with no sound. Hovered for at least 3 to 4 minutes, cloud came over, when cloud moved on object disappered. Never saw it leave.Object was sort of bell shaped.Asked some individuals what they thought it was months later and they did not want to acknowledge they saw anything. One guy thinks it was time travelers.Tried to get video of the object but it disappered befor I could. I feel it was a UFO, only wish I could of obtained video of the object.
